import React from 'react'; export default class CreateExpense extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state ={ cateExpense:"", expense:"", amount:"" } } render(){ return(
this.setState({ expenseID:e.target.value })} >
this.setState({ expense:e.target.value })}>
this.setState({ amount:e.target.value })} >
    ยกเลิก
) } }
